table-entry.name: BOOK
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,title varchar(200),author varchar(200),publisher varchar(100),isAvail boolean default true

table-entry.name: MEMBER
table-entry.col-data: id varchar(200) primary key,name varchar(200),mobile varchar(20),email varchar(100)

table-entry.name: ISSUE
table-entry.col-data: bookID varchar(200) primary key,memberID varchar(200),issueTime timestamp default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,renew_count integer default 0,FOREIGN KEY (bookID) REFERENCES BOOK(id),FOREIGN KEY (memberID) REFERENCES MEMBER(id)

table-entry.name: MAIL_SERVER_INFO
table-entry.col-data: server_name varchar(255),server_port integer,user_email varchar(1024),user_password varchar(1024),ssl_enabled boolean
